We need access to information about your phone\'s identity info (such as IMEI) to help prevent fraud and provide you with a better experience. The app cannot be used without this permission.

We collect your device info (such as IMEI) and link it to your account to prevent other people from logging in to your account. This also helps us detect & avoid fraudulent activities related to offers that are valid only once per user.

I\'ve read and agreed to share my Personally Identifiable Information and other Information
Collection of Personally Identifiable Information and other Information

When you use our App, we collect and store your personal information which is provided by you from time to time. Our primary goal in doing so is to provide you a safe, efficient, smooth and customized experience. This allows us to provide services and features that most likely meet your needs, and to customize our App to make your experience safer and easier. More importantly, while doing so we collect personal information from you that we consider necessary for achieving this purpose.

Once you give us your personal information, you are not anonymous to us. Where possible, we indicate which fields are required and which fields are optional. You always have the option to not provide information by choosing not to use a particular service or feature on the App.

If you transact with us, we collect some additional information, such as your physical location to provide you a better and customized experience.

If you choose to leave feedback or post messages where possible, we will collect that information you provide to us. We retain this information as necessary to resolve disputes, provide customer support and troubleshoot problems as permitted by law.

We collect personally identifiable information (email address, name, phone number, home & office addresses etc.) from you when you set up an account with us. While you can browse some sections of our App without being a registered member, certain activities (such as placing a request for services offered on the App) do require registration. We do use your contact information to send you invoices of the transaction with us.

We collect some of the device data only after taking necessary permissions in context.

Permissions
- To use your camera in order to help you locate your pickup point using augmented reality. This feature might not be available to all users.
- To use your microphone in order to help you board your Shuttl seamlessly.
- To access the information about your phone's identity to help prevent fraud and provide you with a better experience. The app cannot be used without this permission.
- To access your email address to get a more personalized experience.
- To access your contacts to make it easy for you to add contacts to our list to be contacted only in case of emergency.
We just need to re-confirm your details to get you started.

Once you have selected the route you wish to travel on, you can buy a suitable pass.
You can use your pass to book a ride for both morning and evening, 2 rides are deducted from your pass. If you book only in the morning or only in the evening, 1 ride is deducted.
Every pass is valid for a fixed number of days. However, if you for some reason could not consume your ride pack, we will carry-forward the remaining rides in your next pass.
Allow Shuttl to turn on your phone GPS for accurate pickup.
Please enter/select a valid base url
